name: playwright-e2e-ea
description: Automated end-to-end testing suite for Essential Addons for Elementor demo pages using Playwright

scripts.test:docker: docker run --rm --ipc=host -v $(pwd):/work/ -w /work/ mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.57.0-jammy /bin/bash -c 'npm ci && npx playwright test'
scripts.update-snapshots:docker: docker run --rm --ipc=host -v $(pwd):/work/ -w /work/ mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.57.0-jammy /bin/bash -c 'npm ci && npx playwright test --update-snapshots'

author: Abu Hurayra (HurayraIIT)
